info.author: Menziess
info.name: snapstream
info.summary: Streamline your Kafka data processing, this tool aims to standardize streaming data from multiple Kafka clusters. With a pub-sub approach, multiple functions can easily subscribe to incoming messages, serialization can be specified per topic, and data is automatically processed by data sink functions.
